Get Gene Card Resource

Source: R/hgnc_resources.R
hgnc_get_gene_card.Rd

Retrieve a formatted gene card with essential information for LLM context. Returns a structured view of gene information including symbol, name, location, status, aliases, cross-references, and group memberships.

Usage

hgnc_get_gene_card(hgnc_id, format = c("json", "markdown", "text"))

Arguments

hgnc_id

Character or numeric. HGNC ID (with or without "HGNC:" prefix) or gene symbol to look up.

format

Character. Output format: "json" (structured data, default), "markdown" (human-readable), or "text" (plain text summary).

Value

A list with components:

uri

Resource URI

mimeType

Content MIME type

content

Formatted gene card content

gene

Raw gene data (if format="json")

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Get BRCA1 gene card as JSON
card <- hgnc_get_gene_card("HGNC:1100")

# Get gene card as markdown for display
card <- hgnc_get_gene_card("BRCA1", format = "markdown")
} # }

On this page

hgnc.mcp is developed by Bulent Arman Aksoy.

Built with pkgdown. HGNC data from genenames.org.
